pages.title: Gemstone Chimes
pages.text: $(italic)Having dealt with the gems long enough, you now find yourself able to shape these fragile resources in the finest of ways.$(br2)Slowly swaying in the wind, the chimes sounds remind you of the beginning of your journey - the first time you set foot in a geode.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Each Chime emits the soothing sound of their corresponding gemstone.
